mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_HITS = BOARD_HITS+1 WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{board_num}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM AS "boardNum" ,BOARD_TITLE AS "boardTitle" ,MEM_NUM AS "memNum" ,TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "boardDate" ,BOARD_HITS AS "boardHits" FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE PBOARD SET PBOARD_HITS = PBOARD_HITS+1 WHERE PBOARD_NUM = #{pboard_num}
mapper.select: SELECT PBOARD_NUM ,PBOARD_TITLE ,MEM_NUM ,TO_CHAR(PBOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,PBOARD_HITS FROM PBOARD ORDER BY PBOARD_NUM DESC
